hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested change to OrderConfirmationView wiring: removed a `subtotal` prop from `OrderConfirmationView` call because the component now calculates subtotal internally.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add seeded products to the catalog (REQ-22) and explicitly notes backend changes not required; no requirement mentions order confirmation subtotal calculation or prop changes.
